name: PrivateSniper's Style :: Facebook Apps v1.5
description:
Basically this style is a follow on to my Facebook Style style 11029, but expands css code to applications, etc... this may be one of my most updated style's as I try out new apps etc

1.0:- So far I have removed a little from Zynga poker
1.1:- Removed the shout area and banner ads from "Mobties", Removed a few adverts from poker using zynga.com domain.
1.2:- Removed iframes belonging to RockYou
1.3:- Removed iframes belonging to Cubics and Sochr.com
1.4:- Modified Code, removed more adverts
1.5:- Added Sim City Social, made all options as checkboxes, only install the ones u want :)

user.name: PrivateSniper
user.about: Welcome to my UserStyles.org profile, alot of my styles are related to adblocking, some of my styles also include color theme options (usually just the color theme I have used but I am willing to add multi-choice if requested). I am more than happy to receive requests if your patient. Style Options Styles who's descriptions end with :: indicate that they have options which can be configured (this is a new pattern I am using to be able to quickly locate styles with or without options.
